Newton.Yawkey Athletics Center: Yawkey Athletics Center is a 72,000 square feet (6,700 m2) facility located on the north end of Alumni Stadium on the Boston College campus. Opened in February 2003, it houses the football team's offices, weight room, sports medicine, and locker room. The facility also contains Learning Resources for Student-Athletes, and the Murray Room, a large function area for general University use.
